updates.title: Songwriting Competition!
updates.description:
Show off your musicality by performing to this backing track!
You can rap, sing, do a mashup, improvise a jazz solo, or anything else!

updates.title: February Beatnik is Tonight!!
updates.description:
Join us at 7:30pm EST on February, Saturday 27th
for a great night of music, lit, and art!
